movie.synopsis: A somewhat prudish young lady inherits a nudist camp. She wants to shut it down, but is persuaded by its members to give the place a look before she takes any action... See full summary »

review.comment: Yes, this is The Nudist Story! I saw the film in Chicago when I was young. I loved the British actress who played Miss Jane Robinson. This is my favorite nudist movie of all time. Something Weird Video sells it and I purchased a tape. I am wondering if there is a DVD version now. I would have liked to have seen the outtakes because all of the pubic regions have been edited out of this film, although I saw a magazine years ago that showed the actors and actresses completely nude. A cute little story. The Avonmore Sun Club must be sold to pay the taxes on the estate. The handsome lawyer tries to convince Jane to keep the club open for the members who have been enjoying the club for a very long time. Jane eventually visits the club. Very nice.

This title has been available for quite some time from Something Weird Video under the title For Members only, The Nudist Story. This was the original complete title in the UK. Film quality is excellent. The opening credits briefly switch from the original to the title page of "Pussycat Paradise" and then back to the original. That was a brief alternate title in the mid to later 60s.I don't have any idea how long this movie has been available, but it was a happy shock to learn of it's original British title, Google it, and discovery that it has been here for some time. Beyond the opening credits, the film remains complete and beautiful quality. There is even a film trailer after the end of the feature.

I saw a movie with the same title,in color.I loved the story and the movie.I have been looking for a copy of it for years with no luck.It was about a girl who somehow had the authority to confiscate a nudist camp because somehow she was in control of its assets.The participants wanted to show her around,and convince her of the wholeness of the nudist lifstyle.She reluctantly agreed to meet the nudists.She became somewhat attracted by a man who ran the camp.She was showed the camp by him.Later,she removed her clothes and participated in the lifestyle.The camp was saved.Another actress liked the same guy,so there was a little catfighting going on.This lady was introduced to another nudist couple,who were friends with the man who ran the camp.So they helped convince her of the wholeness of the lifestyle,also.I remember her eating an apple,sitting at a picnic table with this man.It was a cute scene.Also,there was some kind of a party for "the old lady",who was the actual owner.Can you help me locate this film?
